mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_reply (review_board_no, review_reply_content, review_reply_writer) VALUES (#{reviewBoardNo}, #{reviewReplyContent}, ${reviewReplyWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT A.review_reply_no, A.review_reply_content, A.review_reply_writer, A.review_reply_date, B.review_board_no FROM review_reply A, review B WHERE A.review_board_no = B.review_board_no ORDER BY review_reply_no LIMIT #{p.pageStart}, #{p.amount}
SELECT feed_reply_no, feed_reply_content, feed_reply_writer, feed_reply_date, feed_board_no FROM feed_reply WHERE feed_reply_no = #{feedReplyNo}
